![](images/logo_arabesque_clair.png)

_Arabesque_ is a web application for thematic mapping of flow and spatial networks datasets. See

The documentation is available here : 

The documentation aims to present how _Arabesque_ works and how to use it using example datasets provided.

The documentation is segmented in several parts:

* [Interface presentation](./interface.html)
* [Data importation](./data-import.html)
* [Data processing](./data-processing.html)
* [Designing flowmap background](./Design-map-background.html)
* [Designing flowmap signs](./Design-flowmap-signs.html)
* [Filtering flowdata](./Filter-flowdata.html)
* [Examples/Datasets](./examples.html)
* [Exporting flowmap](./exports.html)
* [References](./examples.html)
* [gflowiz-arabesque](./gflowiz-arabesque-project.html)

## About _Arabesque_ {-} 

The application is available here: [arabesque.ifsttar.fr](http://arabesque.ifsttar.fr/) 
For more information on the project, see: [geoflowiz.hypotheses.org](https://geoflowiz.hypotheses.org/).

Please report any issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/gflowiz/arabesque). This is a Free and OpenSource project, feel free to help us make it better.
